statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeInformation;
SELECT employee_name, salary FROM EmployeeInformation WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary FROM EmployeeInformation ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary FROM EmployeeInformation WHERE performance_review IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary FROM EmployeeInformation WHERE salary BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeInformation WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, salary FROM EmployeeInformation WHERE employee_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY salary ASC;
SELECT employee_name, performance_review FROM EmployeeInformation WHERE salary < 40000;
SELECT employee_id AS ID, employee_name AS Name, salary AS Salary FROM EmployeeInformation WHERE performance_review IS NULL;
SELECT AVG(salary) AS average_salary FROM EmployeeInformation;
SELECT * FROM Employee_Info;
SELECT name, salary FROM Employee_Info WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT employee_id, name, hire_date FROM Employee_Info ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT name, hire_date FROM Employee_Info WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT e.name, p.review_date, p.review_text FROM Employee_Info e JOIN Performance_Reviews p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, name, salary, hire_date FROM Employee_Info WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Performance_Reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, name, review_text FROM Employee_Info JOIN Performance_Reviews ON Employee_Info.employee_id = Performance_Reviews.employee_id WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY review_text DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name, hire_date FROM Employee_Info WHERE hire_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, name, salary FROM Employee_Info WHERE salary BETWEEN 40000 AND 60000 ORDER BY salary DESC, name ASC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, salary, hire_date, performance_review FROM employees
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY last_name DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, hire_date, performance_review FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, salary FROM salaries WHERE salary_type = 'monthly' AND salary > 6000
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews ORDER BY review_date ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, salary, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY hire_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, performance_review FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY review_date DESC

SELECT e.employee_id, e.first_name, s.salary, pr.review_text FROM employees e INNER JOIN salaries s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id INNER JOIN performance_reviews pr ON e.employee_id = pr.employee_id WHERE s.salary_type = 'Monthly' AND pr.review_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY s.salary DESC, pr.review_date ASC

SELECT e.employee_id, e.first_name, e.last_name, s.salary, s.salary_type, pr.review_text FROM employees e LEFT JOIN salaries s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id LEFT JOIN performance_reviews pr ON e.employee_id = pr.employee_id WHERE s.salary IS NULL OR pr.review_date IS NULL ORDER BY e.employee_id ASC
SELECT * FROM employee_personal_info;
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM employee_personal_info ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, date_of_birth, address FROM employee_personal_info WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT review_id, review_date, review_text FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_salary WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM employee_personal_info WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM employee_salary WHERE salary > 50000 AND deductions < 1000;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, address FROM employee_personal_info ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, review_date, review_text FROM performance_reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, password_hash, two_factor_enabled FROM employee_security WHERE two_factor_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT address, name FROM employees ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT info_type, info_details FROM confidential_info;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, salary FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT e.name, d.name AS department FROM employees e INNER JOIN departments d ON e.employee_id = d.manager_id;
SELECT e.name, pr.review_date, pr.rating, pr.comments FROM employees e INNER JOIN performance_reviews pr ON e.employee_id = pr.employee_id;
SELECT e.name, s.salary_amount, s.effective_date FROM employees e INNER JOIN salaries s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id ORDER BY s.effective_date DESC;
